item.title: EKC 24.1 IS THE LATEST VERSION. TO SEE WHAT VERSION YOU ARE ON YOU CAN SIMPLY CLICK ON EKC AND IT WILL TELL YOU YOUR CURRENT VERSION. MOVIES TAKE A LITTLE WHILE TO LOAD. ONLY CLICK ONCE. 1080P LINKS ARE BEING FOUND NOW THROUGH MOVIES SO THIS TAKES A LITTLE LINGER FOR THE SYSTEM TO SCRAPE. BE PATIENT. UNDER MOVIES AND TV SHOWS YOU CAN SELECT LINKS MANUALLY OR TRY DIFFERENT ADDONS THAT USE OTHER SCRAPERS. THE DEFAULT SET UP RIGHT NOW IS CURRENTLY WORKING GREAT BUT BACK UPS ARE ALWAYS A GOOD THING.
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM
SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM SETUP. SIGN UP AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/GEARSTV THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL. APKS ARE AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD IN THE APK SECTION.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE / FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
